video.title: Guess with Jess
video.synopsis: Little kids ask big questions, and "Guess with Jess" empowers them to find answers to everyday questions about the world around them.

episodes.synopsis: Jess and his friends experiment with things that float and sink. / Willow comes up with a way for everyone to keep warm at her apple-picking party.
episodes.title: How Can We Make a Boat? / How Can We All Keep Warm?

episodes.synopsis: Jess gets a surprise when he looks for his friend Chloe the caterpillar. / Jess tries to find out how colored stripes in the sky got there.
episodes.title: What's Happened to Chloe the Caterpillar? / When Will My Colored Stripes Come Back?

episodes.synopsis: Jess hears a voice in a hollow log and sets out to find his new friend. / Mimi hates throwing garbage away, so Jess helps her to reuse and recycle.
episodes.title: Who Did I Hear in the Big Hollow Log? / What Can We Do with Mimi's Garbage?

episodes.synopsis: When Billie leaves the meadow to find her lost magnifying glass, Baa is lonely. / Mimi can't stop scratching. She has a tickly problem.
episodes.title: Who Wants to Live in Baa's Meadow? / Why Are the Ants Visiting Mimi?

episodes.synopsis: Jess wonders why spiders spin webs. / Willow is stuck inside her stable with a sore hoof, so Jess and Mimi try to cheer her up.
episodes.title: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? / How Can We Bring the Outside Inside?

episodes.synopsis: Jess finds out what all his friends like most about spring. / Mimi helps Jess camouflage himself during a game of hide-and-seek.
episodes.title: What's My Favorite Thing About Spring? / How Can I Hide Without Being Found?

episodes.synopsis: Horace helps Jess find out why bees make honey. / Jess hears a strange hoo-hooing noise and tries to find out where it's coming from.
episodes.title: Why Do Bees Make Honey? / When Will the Owl Go Hoo-Hoo?

episodes.synopsis: Jess and the puppies want to play puddle jumping, but the puddle has disappeared. / It's a hot sunny day and Jess has found a new friend.
episodes.title: Where Has My Puddle Gone? / Why Has My Shadow Gone Away?

episodes.synopsis: It's a cold  day on the farm and all the water bowls are frozen. / Mimi invites Horace to tea and asks Jess to paint a lily pad she's made for him.
episodes.title: When Will the Water Come Back? / How Can We Paint The Lily Pad?

episodes.synopsis: Jess loses his special feather. / Jess and the puppies have a sleepover, but fall asleep before they can wish on a star.
episodes.title: Where's My Feather Gone? / Where Have All The Stars Gone?

episodes.synopsis: Mimi is very sad, so Jess gets his friends to play music to cheer her up. / Mimi is upset when her little friend Sammy Snail goes missing.
episodes.title: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? / How Can We Find Sammy Snail?

episodes.synopsis: Mimi has made Jess a kite, but he has trouble getting it to fly. / When a dandelion appears in Mimi's garden, Jess tries to find out who planted it.
episodes.title: Why Won't My Kite Fly? / How Did a Dandelion Seed Get into Mimi's Garden?

episodes.synopsis: Mimi asks what Jess is going to do with his nature collection. / Jess hears a rumbly sound in the sky and tries to find out what it is.
episodes.title: What Can I Do with My Nature Collection? / What's the Grumbly Rumbly Noise?

episodes.synopsis: Jess wants to grow some beans for Mimi as a present but doesn't know where to start. / Jess meets a hedgehog on the path and asks him to come play.
episodes.title: What Do We Need to Grow Beans? / Why's Hedgehog Curled Up in a Ball?

episodes.synopsis: Mimi finds her garden messy and full of swirly piles of earth. / Jess finds little piles of earth in Willow's orchard and wonders what's making them.
episodes.title: How Can We Make the Most Beautiful Garden Ever? / Why Are There Little Hills in the Orchard?

episodes.synopsis: One winter morning, Jess finds lots of ladybugs in his barn. / Little Bird keeps eating Mimi's lettuce seeds, and Jess must find a way to stop her.
episodes.title: Why Are There So Many Ladybugs? / How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating the Seeds?

episodes.synopsis: Baa and Billie build a seesaw, but Jess can't make it work! / Jess shows Mimi his nature collection, and she asks what he's going to do with it.
episodes.title: How Can I Up and Down on the Seesaw? / What Can I Do with My Nature Collection?

episodes.synopsis: Jess picks a peach for Baa, but it's too hard to eat. How can Jess make his peach soft? / It's a cold day on Greendale Farm, and Billie is freezing!
episodes.title: How Can I Make My Peach Soft?  / How Can We Help Billie Stay Warm?

episodes.synopsis: Jess looks for a place to hide so he can watch butterflies in the Whispering Wood. / Jess and the puppies have fun playing on Cherry Hill in the snow.
episodes.title: How Can We Hide to Watch Butterflies?  / How Can I Go Faster Than Joey and Jinx?

episodes.synopsis: Baa invites everyone to join him for a special harvest breakfast. / Jess and the puppies help Mimi decide which hat to wear.
episodes.title: What Shall We Have For Our Harvest Breakfast?  / What Hat Should Mimi Wear?

episodes.synopsis: When Jess's little tree turns brown, he must find out what's wrong with it. / Jess and his friends find a way to keep cool at Mimi's special dance.
episodes.title: What's Happening to My Little Tree?  / How Can We All Keep Cool?

episodes.synopsis: Jess finds a funny little creature in Horace's pond. / Horace puts on a music show, but when it rains, Jess must find a way to keep everyone dry.
episodes.title: What's the Funny Little Creature in the Pond?  / How Can We Keep Dry for Horace's Concert?

episodes.synopsis: When Horace goes away for a few days, Jess is left to look after Kevin the Carp. / On Christmas Eve, everyone makes decorations for the tree.
episodes.title: How Can I Make Kevin the Carp Happy in His Pond?  / How Can We Decorate the Christmas Tree?

episodes.synopsis: Jess tries to think of ways to make his little wagon go faster. / Jess learns all about shapes when he has to fix a hole in Baa's trough.
episodes.title: How Can I Make the Trolly Go Faster?  / How Can We Mend Baa's Trough?

episodes.synopsis: What is the mysterious plant that's growing by the water barrel? / Jess follows a series of clues in order to find his friends and a special surprise!
episodes.title: What's That Green Hairy Stuff?  / How Can I Find My Friends?

episodes.synopsis: Jess finds acorns buried under the oak tree. Who put them there, and why? / Jess tries to find a way to sing as beautifully as Brown Bird.
episodes.title: Why Are Acorns Buried Under the Tree?  / How Can I Sound Like Brown Bird?
